goals.description: Run a full critique-refine-test-self-review cycle to verify end-to-end functionality of the refactored engine.
Refine the plugin architecture to make it more extensible and easier to add new capabilities.
Investigate the possibility of executing independent goals in parallel to improve performance.
Adopt a dependency management tool (e.g., poetry or pip-tools) to manage dependencies more effectively.
